entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
